results.title: Nutraceutical and pharmaceutical cocktails did not preserve diaphragm muscle function or reduce muscle damage in D2-mdx mice.
results.text_hl: These data suggest that @CHEMICAL_Quercetin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011794 @@@quercetin@@@, @CHEMICAL_nicotinamide_beta_riboside @CHEMICAL_MESH:C018613 @@@NR@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, independently and in combination, did not prevent @<m>DISEASE_Inferior_Wall_Myocardial_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D056989 @@@diaphragmatic injury@@@ or preserve respiratory function.

citations.NLM: Spaulding HR, Quindry T, Quindry JC, Selsby JT. Nutraceutical and pharmaceutical cocktails did not preserve diaphragm muscle function or reduce muscle damage in D2-mdx mice. Exp Physiol. 2020 Jun;105(6):989-999. PMID: 32267561
